pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automated Retrieval of Disaster Event Data // Access and manage the application programming interface (API) of the United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs' (OCHA) ReliefWeb disaster events at https://reliefweb.int/disasters/. It makes it easy to retrieve a user-defined sample (or all of the available data) from ReliefWeb, enabling a seamless integration of regular data updates into the research work flow.
